alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 9:05PM CDT until March 27 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...From this evening to late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Agricultural land along the river is flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 25.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 26.1 feet by tomorrow morning and then will slowly rise to a crest of 26.5 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 25.1 Tue 8 pm CDT 26.2 26.5 25.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 915 AM CDT.
